title: Bug 11866 - Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: Incorrect labels are displayed in the Update Test Suite dialog.
OB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as TestClasses (missing space). The status line refers to methods being selected instead of types. The action name is displayed as TestSuite instead of Test Suite.
EB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' should be written with a space as 'Test Classes'. The status line should correctly mention types being selected, not methods. The action name should be displayed as 'Test Suite', not 'TestSuite'.
SR:
1. Open the Update Test Suite dialog.
2. Observe the label 'Test Classes to be included'.
3. Check the status line for the description of selected items.
4. Look at the action name in the dialog.
